SGCC

Sales Compensation Governance Committee

ACTIVE

Responsible for establishing, maintaining, and improving the sales compensation governance framework. Ensures all compensation plans, policies, and procedures are fair, compliant, transparent, and aligned with business strategy.

Total Members

9

7 voting

Meeting Cadence

Quarterly

Quorum

5 of 7 voting members required for quorum
